name: CTRL (pedroMz)
description:
This game was made under 48 hours for 1-Bit Jam, with the theme "only black and white pixels" (I hope I remembered to get rid of all antialiasing)

It's heavily inspired by the old flash game SHIFT. I remember when I used to play it I would always get that sticky keys notification, so I made it with CTRL (control), lol.

Use CTRL to shif/flip the room, WASD or Arrow Keys and Spacebar to move and jump. You can always press Esc to get to level select screen to skip any level.

I have to say that I kind of forgot about the secondary theme ("One Button") until it was too late, but you can kind of say that the game play is centered around One Button (it's called CTRL after all).

*there's an "easter egg" in one of the levels, if you can find it (one of the screenshots shows it :P )
